pattern.name: Is weekend
pattern.description:
Divide the date into workday/weekend.
Note that this pattern is tricky as the database can be set to start the week on any day in a week. And this setting may not correspond the actual division of work days into workday/weekend.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , CASE WHEN EXTRACT(dow from @timeColumn) >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "@columnName" FROM @propagatedTable
